byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and RANDAL C. ARCHIBOLD

lead_paragraph: The expected encounter held deep significance during a gathering of regional leaders, as President Obama’s move to ease tensions with Cuba has overshadowed the official agenda.

headline.print_headline: Handshake for Obama and President of Cuba
headline.main: Handshake for Obama and Raúl Castro of Cuba

snippet: The expected encounter held deep significance during a gathering of regional leaders, as President Obama’s move to ease tensions with Cuba has overshadowed the official agenda.
abstract: Pres Barack Obama and Cuban Pres Raul Castro encounter each other as Summit of the Americas gets underway, and in a significant diplomatic gesture, exchange a handshake; Obama and Castro are scheduled to hold discussions in what will be the first full-fledged meeting between presidents of the United States and Cuba in more than 50 years.
